title: MNA Saad Waseem meets PM; thanks him for prioritizing public welfare projects
content:
LAHORE, May 5 (APP): Member of the National Assembly Saad Waseem Thursday called on Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif and thanked him for placing the public welfare projects among his priorities.
During the meeting, they discussed the overall political situation as well as the matters pertaining to the constituency.
The parliamentarian congratulated the prime minister on his recent successful visits to Saudi Arabia and the United Arab Emirates.
He also thanked the prime minister for directing the authorities concerned for the early completion of the development projects.
